Text.Page:
, I've located the fifth stone. Please join me in Highwatch.

- Meren

The fifth stone, the Frost Stone, was located in Frost Reach.
Launa helped you on the search for the stone, and in return, you helped Launa clear her workload so she could attend the banquet.

She retrieved the Frost Stone and you placed it on the Eternal Crown.

, the next stone is called the Frost Stone.

It happens to be near Frost Reach, so I contacted {@linkcreature:34#2005#Launa} for help.

Take this Teleport Scroll. It will take you to Bleakrock. You can meet Launa there.

Good luck.

Hey there! Hope this place isn't too cold for you.

I think you already know, but Meren says that the stone that you're looking for is someplace here. We think..."Is there something wrong?"

That banquet in Velika, do you know when it starts?

I'm so busy all the time that I really don't have a chance to attend parties or other events.

Do you know what food they'll have? Will there be a play?"I'm not sure."

Oh...okay.

I can help you out with finding that stone, but I'm really busy right now. Could you do me a favor in return, and help me out by completing some Guardian Legion Missions?"Of course."

Really?
Thanks!

What I really need you to do is claim at least four Guardian Legion Mission rewards. That should clear my schedule enough for me to help you find that Frost Stone.

Let's meet back here in Bleakrock when we're done.

See you soon!

You're back!

You really came through for me!"Did you find the stone?"

Of course!

I never let anyone down.

Here it is.

Try it now!

I want to see if the crown really changes!

Wow!
I can feel the aura...it's overwhelming!

It's hard to believe that the crown isn't even complete yet. This should be the perfect gift for the goddess.

Thanks for the help. The next time we meet, it'll be at the banquet!
Did you find the Frost Stone?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Indeed I did."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Just one last stone to go.

Take this. It should help you retrieve the final stone.
I'll let you know when I have more information.
May the goddess be with you.
